device.name: left_lower_arm_skin
device.group: this group can contain two parameters: skinCanAddrsPatch1 and skinCanAddrsPatch2 the list of skin boards contains a list of adresses of mtb board connected to ethernet board (EMS, MC4PLUS) on can port 1. If there are any mtb board the parameter can be removed contains a list of adresses of mtb board connected to ethernet board (EMS, MC4PLUS) on can port 2. If there are any mtb board the parameter can be removed
